column5: ***AVAILABLE FOR SUPER BOWL WEEKEND!!** This beautiful 4 bedroom/2.5 bath farmhouse sits on 1.2 beautifully manicured acres complete with a stocked fishing pond. Enjoy a trip to Houston without the hustle and bustle of busy Houston traffic. Situated just 10 minutes from the outskirts of Houston it is close to everything Houston has to offer! It is 22 miles from NRG Stadium and has plenty of dining and entertainment choices nearby in Pearland, Texas. Book today!
